description: A React component for the Tic Tac Toe game, including the main App function and a Square component for rendering individual squares.

methods.name: App
methods.description: The main component that manages the game's state and renders the game board and status.

methods.name: Square
methods.description: A functional component representing an individual square in the Tic Tac Toe grid.

methods.name: calculateWinner
methods.description: A helper function to determine the winner of the game based on the current state of the squares.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles the square click events, updating the game state accordingly.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game state to start a new game.
